headline: Show HN: Eazypay.me – Invoicing Made Simple
description:
Hi I'm Chris, a developer based in London.

EazyPay.me is simple invoicing software.

You can create invoices using templates, share them via email, direct link and pdf. And recently I added getting paid electronically via invoices.

I created EazyPay.me because from personal experience, invoicing software comes loaded with features I don't need. Also, my Dad still hand delivers printed out invoices and a friend of mine said he just wants to get notified when he get's paid.

I'm monetising EazyPay.me by charging a subscription for additional features and more usage (more invoice for example). And also charging a fee on invoices paid electronically.

I've gone with a fremium model as I want to gather feedback fast, but I'm open to trying a free trial.

It's still early but I have just over a thousand sign ups, the vast majority of which are still free.

Any feedback would be massively appreciated! Like I mentioed above, there's a free tier so you can take a look around for free. https://www.eazypay.me/?source=hn

Thanks,

Chris
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Eazypay.me - 简单开票
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Eazypay.me - 簡單開票
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，我是Chris，一个在伦敦的开发者。

EazyPay.me是一个简单的发票软件。

你可以使用模板创建发票，通过电子邮件、直接链接和pdf分享。最近我还增加了通过发票获得电子付款。

我创建EazyPay.me是因为根据个人经验，开票软件有很多我不需要的功能。此外，我的父亲仍然亲手递送打印出来的发票，我的一个朋友说，他只想在收到付款时得到通知。

我通过对额外的功能和更多的使用（例如更多的发票）收取订阅费来实现EazyPay.me的盈利。

我选择了免费模式，因为我想快速收集反馈，但我愿意尝试免费试用。

现在还很早，但我已经有一千多人注册了，其中绝大多数还是免费的。就像我上面提到的，有一个免费层，所以你可以免费看一下。 https://www.eazypay.me/?source=hn

谢谢,

Chris
